title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 100.5 - Personnel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 100.5 - Personnel

State Regulations
(a) Personnel for
whom reimbursement is claimed shall be qualified for their respective positions
and shall possess at the time of appointment qualifications established for the
position by the State Commissioner of Mental Hygiene or acceptable to
him. (b) For the purposes of
reimbursement for consultant and educational services, qualified mental health
personnel shall include psychiatrists, psychiatric social workers, clinical
psychologists, mental health consultants, mental health educators and
psychiatric nurses. (c) Personnel
of private and/or voluntary agencies with whom contracts are made for the
rendition of services or the operation of facilities must meet standards
established by or acceptable to the State Commissioner of Mental

Hygiene. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
100.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
